alert.note: Alert for Harnett; Johnston; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 07 at 3:25PM EDT until April 07 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Harnett County in central North Carolina... South central Wake County in central North Carolina... Northwestern Johnston County in central North Carolina... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 324 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Lillington, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Smithfield, Lillington, Fuquay-Varina, Clayton, Angier, Coats, Four Oaks, Seminole, Raven Rock State Park and Coats Crossroads. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central North Carolina. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
